sub_title: HRBP of Europe at Aiko Energy Germany GmbH
summary:
Aiko (stock code:600732) is a world-leading solar PV company founded in 2009, mainly focusing on solar cells, ABC (All Back Contact) modules, and PV-Storage-Charging-Load integrated solutions. By 2023 April, the company has a total global cell shipment of 90GW+ and an annual capacity of 42.5GW.

In 2022, Aiko established Aiko Energy, a wholly-owned subsidiary, focusing on distributed markets, integrating energy technology and digital technology, promoting serial module products and PV energy solutions and services based on a new generation of N-type back-contact ABC cell technologies.
